title: How LinkedIn is changing and why some are not happy
description: LinkedIn's reputation for being dry and corporate is changing but not all users like the more personal tone.

title: TUC: Government failing to protect workers from AI
description: Union group claims using artificial intelligence to hire and fire staff could lead to greater discrimination.

title: Sony World Photography Award 2023: Winner refuses award after revealing AI creation
description: Boris Eldagsen said he used the image to test the competition and to create an "open discussion".

title: Netflix apologises as Love is Blind reunion delayed for UK viewers
description: The special episode was pre-recorded and aired it in the US, but global viewers are left waiting.

title: Angry Birds: Sega in talks to buy video game maker Rovio
description: The Japan-based entertainment giant Sega is in discussions over a deal for Rovio reportedly worth $1bn.
